stepAnswer: 48 mph for local train and 60 mph for express train
stepTitle: An express train and a local train leave Pittsburgh to travel to Washington, D.C. The express train can make the trip in four hours and the local train takes five hours for the trip. The speed of the express train is 12 miles per hour faster than the speed of the local train. Find the speed of both trains.
choices: 48 mph for local train and 65 mph for express train
50 mph for local train and 60 mph for express train
48 mph for local train and 60 mph for express train
